attributes.action: stop paying benefits and providing NHS treatments to immagrants and asylum seekers until they have paid into the system for five years through tax and N.I contributions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should immigrants economic asylum seekers get benefits and services without paying into the system. This is a major problem causing considerable strain on our resources which in turn increases council tax and  taxes. If people want to come and work here they should fund themselves not expect the good old tax payer to pay up and support them.
